summary: This brief documentary-style film presents the status of Great Britain near the end of the Second World War by means of a visual diary for a baby boy born in September, 1944. Narration ... See full summary Â»
cast: Michael Redgrave|Myra Hess|John Gielgud|Frederick Allen|Bill|Elizabeth Jenkins|Elvin Jenkins|Timothy James Jenkins|Jennifer|Frank Phillips|Peter Robert|George Woodbridge
keywords: victory in europe day|female soldier|accordionist|baby|british documentary movement
title: A Diary for Timothy
